External DNS queries targeting multiple.Action: Analyze Zeek dns.log for queries originating from external IP addresses targeting multiple distinct organizational subdomains or hosts. Use clustering or graph analysis on source IP and queried host pairs to identify potential reconnaissance scanning patterns. Identify rare subdomain queries using frequency analysis.

External DNS queries attempting to enume.Action: Analyze Zeek dns.log for high-frequency DNS query patterns from external sources, specifically looking for repeated queries for MX, SRV, or TXT records, or a large volume of queries resulting in NXDOMAIN responses (potential subdomain bruteforcing). Use time series analysis to detect bursts of such queries.
